hyperbolize.graphe
Class GrapheHyperbolique

java.lang.Object
  hyperbolize.graphe.AbsGraphe
      hyperbolize.graphe.ListGraphe<NodeHyperbolique>
          hyperbolize.graphe.GrapheHyperbolique
All Implemented Interfaces:
Objet
Direct Known Subclasses:
GrapheMembership
public class GrapheHyperbolique
extends ListGraphe<NodeHyperbolique>
implements Objet

This class contains the representation of an hyperbolic graph. It is based on a list graph and implements a drawable interface in order to be rendered in OpenGL.

Version:
3.1

prepareGraphe

public void prepareGraphe()
This function starts the computing of the positions in the hyperbolic space. Following the H3 two-pass scheme defined by Tamara MUNZER.

printValue

public void printValue()
Just for debugging purposes, prints all the polar coordinates of the nodes
